name: Husbands Just Don't Understand!
description:
***Husbands Just Don't Understand! is part of our Polish Addiction Line***

Husbands Just Don't Understand is a teal-ish forest green with flecks of green and blue shimmer with the same scattered holo that can be found in many of our products.

Swatches shown are 2 coats topped with Glisten & Glow's HK Girl top coat.

$1.00 from each bottle sold will be donated to Shriners Hospitals for Children.

Some settling may occur after sitting for awhile.If this happens please give your polish a few shakes and it should be ready to use.

***PLEASE NOTE***
We try our best to get the pictures of our polish in true to life colors as possible. Some camera's just don't play well with certain colors and different monitor brand/settings can alter the appearance of colors as well. 

 We try our best to make each and every batch exactly the same but due to being hand mixed batches may vary a bit. Some settling may occur after sitting for awhile.If this happens please give your polish a few shakes and it should be ready to use.

Please be aware of this before purchasing. 
Thank you!

All of our products are 3 free.

NO Dibutyl Phthalate (DBP) 
NO Toluene 
NO Formaldehyde 

Ingredients:
Ethyl Acetate, Butyl Acetate, Nitrocellulose, Phthalic Anhydride/Trimellitic Anhydride/Glycols Copolymer, Isopropyl Alcohol, Sucrose Acetate Isobutyrate, Acrylates Copolymer, N-Butyl Alcohol, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Acetyl Tributyl Citrate, Camphor, Citric Acid, Benzophenone-1 May also contain: Mica, Titanium Dioxide, Iron Oxide, Ferric Ferrocyanide, Red 28, Red 22, Orange 5, Yellow 11, Violet 2 ext, Red 6, Red 7, Yellow 6, Yellow 5, Blue 1, ultramarines, bismuth oxychloride

There's Snow Place Like Home is a lovely white crelly filled with all kinds of shimmer and has a little bit of a texture when dry. Like fresh snow gleaming in the sun!

name: Multiple Personalities
description:
Multiple Personalities  is a gorgeous multi-chrome ( one of my favorite kinds of polishes, flakies are a very close second!! ) This beauty shifts from an emerald green to silver, purple, and blue/ turquoise! It reminded me of The Hulk for some reason :)

***PLEASE READ CAREFULLY***
Swatches shown are 2 coat OVER BLACK! This polish is very sheer and can not be worn alone. This looks best over black but might look great over other dark colors. The possibilities are endless!

$1.00 from each bottle sold will be donated to Shriners Hospitals for Children.

Some settling may occur after sitting for awhile.If this happens please give your polish a few shakes and it should be ready to use.

***PLEASE NOTE***
We try our best to get the pictures of our polish in true to life colors as possible. Some camera's just don't play well with certain colors and different monitor brand/settings can alter the appearance of colors as well. 

 We try our best to make each and every batch exactly the same but due to being hand mixed batches may vary a bit. Some settling may occur after sitting for awhile.If this happens please give your polish a few shakes and it should be ready to use.

Please be aware of this before purchasing. 
Thank you!

All of our products are 3 free.

NO Dibutyl Phthalate (DBP) 
NO Toluene 
NO Formaldehyde

name: Falling For Autumn Collection In Mini's
description:
***This listing is for the Full set of the Falling For Autumn Collection***

Akiko ( Japanese for Bright Autumn Child ) is a beautiful bright holographic rusty orange. 

Anona ( Roman Goddess of Harvest ) is a gorgeous blackened olive green with gold shimmer and glass flecks.

Aphaea ( Greek Goddess of Agriculture and Fertility ) is a pretty dusty grey purple with a light dusting of holo shimmer and a gorgeous purple/pink sheen. 

Scarlet is a stunning cranberry red with scattered  holo to make it light from within and nice blue/purple sheen.

name: You're Turning Ne-On! On sale today!! Last batch till spring don't miss out.
description:
You're Turning Ne-On! was named by one of our FB friends Mandy Reilly!! YAY Mandy!!

You're Turning Ne-On is a mix of white and black hex, squares, and rectangles in various sizes and medium neon blue, neon pink and neon green  hexes in a clear base.

Swatch show is one coat topped with Glisten & Glow's HK Girl top coat.

In the last swatch picture I used butter London's Matte top coat to matte all fingers :) 

$1.00 from each bottle sold will be donated to Shriners Hospitals for Children.

Some settling may occur after sitting for awhile.If this happens please give your polish a few shakes and it should be ready to use.

***PLEASE NOTE***
We try our best to get the pictures of our polish in true to life colors as possible. Some camera's just don't play well with certain colors and different monitor brand/settings can alter the appearance of colors as well. 

 We try our best to make each and every batch exactly the same but due to being hand mixed batches may vary a bit. Some settling may occur after sitting for awhile.If this happens please give your polish a few shakes and it should be ready to use.

Please be aware of this before purchasing. 
Thank you!

All of our products are 3 free.

NO Dibutyl Phthalate (DBP) 
NO Toluene 
NO Formaldehyde 

Ingredients:
Ethyl Acetate, Butyl Acetate, Nitrocellulose, Phthalic Anhydride/Trimellitic Anhydride/Glycols Copolymer, Isopropyl Alcohol, Sucrose Acetate Isobutyrate, Acrylates Copolymer, N-Butyl Alcohol, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Acetyl Tributyl Citrate, Camphor, Citric Acid, Benzophenone-1 May also contain: Mica, Titanium Dioxide, Iron Oxide, Ferric Ferrocyanide, Red 28, Red 22, Orange 5, Yellow 11, Violet 2 ext, Red 6, Red 7, Yellow 6, Yellow 5, Blue 1, ultramarines, bismuth oxychloride
